# Fairplay Moving - Design System

## Design Philosophy

### Color Palette
- **Primary Blue**: #003A72 (Trust, reliability, professionalism)
- **Accent Orange**: #EB771A (Energy, warmth, call-to-action)
- **Supporting Colors**:
  - Neutral Gray: #6B7280 (Text, secondary elements)
  - Light Gray: #F3F4F6 (Backgrounds, sections)
  - White: #FFFFFF (Clean backgrounds, cards)
  - Success Green: #10B981 (Confirmation states)
  - Warning Red: #EF4444 (Error states)

### Typography
- **Display Font**: Playfair Display (Headlines, hero text - elegant serif)
- **Body Font**: Inter (Clean, readable sans-serif for all content)
- **Accent Font**: Poppins (Buttons, labels, modern feel)

### Visual Language
- **Professional Trust**: Clean lines, generous white space, organized layouts
- **Local Chicago Focus**: Urban sophistication with approachable warmth
- **Service Excellence**: Clear hierarchy, intuitive navigation, accessible design
- **Conversion-Focused**: Strategic use of orange for CTAs, clear value propositions

## Visual Effects & Styling

### Used Libraries
- **Anime.js**: Smooth animations for quote modal, form interactions
- **Typed.js**: Typewriter effect for hero headlines
- **Splide.js**: Image carousels for testimonials and service showcases
- **ECharts.js**: Data visualization for service areas and statistics
- **p5.js**: Subtle background particle effects for hero section
- **Splitting.js**: Text reveal animations for section headers
- **Pixi.js**: Interactive service area map visualization

### Animation & Effects
- **Hero Section**: Typewriter animation for main headline with color cycling
- **Service Cards**: Hover lift effects with subtle shadows
- **Quote Modal**: Smooth slide-in animation with backdrop blur
- **Statistics**: Counter animations for trust indicators
- **Image Galleries**: Ken Burns effect on hover
- **Form Elements**: Micro-interactions on focus/blur states

### Header Effect
- **Sticky Navigation**: Smooth transition with background opacity change
- **Mobile Quote Button**: Floating action button with pulse animation
- **Logo Animation**: Subtle scale effect on scroll
- **Menu Transitions**: Smooth slide animations for mobile menu

### Background & Layout
- **Consistent Background**: Light gray (#F3F4F6) throughout all pages
- **Section Differentiation**: Subtle white cards with soft shadows
- **Grid System**: 12-column responsive grid with consistent spacing
- **Visual Hierarchy**: Clear typography scale and color contrast

### Interactive Elements
- **Buttons**: Primary (blue), Secondary (white), Accent (orange)
- **Forms**: Clean input styling with focus states and validation
- **Cards**: Service cards with hover effects and consistent imagery
- **Modals**: Backdrop blur with smooth entrance animations

### Mobile Optimization
- **Touch-Friendly**: Minimum 44px touch targets
- **Thumb Navigation**: Bottom-accessible quote button
- **Readable Text**: Minimum 16px font size on mobile
- **Optimized Images**: WebP format with fallbacks
- **Fast Loading**: Critical CSS inlined, lazy loading for images

### Accessibility Features
- **Color Contrast**: Minimum 4.5:1 ratio for all text
- **Focus Indicators**: Clear keyboard navigation
- **Screen Reader**: Semantic HTML and ARIA labels
- **Alt Text**: Descriptive text for all images
- **Motion Preferences**: Respect user's motion preferences

## Content Strategy
- **Trust Building**: Professional imagery, certifications, reviews
- **Local SEO**: Chicago-focused content and service areas
- **Educational**: Moving tips, preparation guides, FAQ
- **Conversion**: Clear CTAs, quote forms, contact information
